title: Drawing, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash on laid paper
inscribed:
Pen and brown ink "Pianta del Teatro / Reale di Napoli / Denominato di / S. Carlo"
Addition by a later hand in pen and black ink: "costruito nel / 1737"
Scale in lower margin.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Ground plan of the San Carlo theatre at Naples.  Verso: study for the base of a tomb and section of a circular ground plan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-97.
